ing.item: 6 ounce raw chicken breast half, chopped fine; (about 3/4 cup)

directions.step:
Heat oil in a small saucepan. Add onion and cook until translucent. Add chicken and cook for 4 minutes. Add rice and bay leaf, stir to coat and add stock. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer and cover. Cook for 15 minutes or until tender. Season with salt and pepper, fluff rice with a fork and serve.
Yield: 3 to 4 servings Recipe By :ESSENCE OF EMERIL SHOW #EE122
